net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.fuzzyrule

Class FuzzyRuleBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.base.RuleBase
      • net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.fuzzyrule.FuzzyRuleBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC, IClassifier

    public class FuzzyRuleBase
extends RuleBase
    Implements a fuzzy rule-base for classification problems.

    The rule-base implements a classifier which comprises a set of fuzzy classification rules. Main methods: The classify() method classifies a particular instance or a complete dataset and returns the class predictions for the instances. Unlike crisp rules, the fuzzy rules covers the instances with a particular coverage grade. The higher the grade is the more confidence that the rule covers the instance.

    Author:
    Sebastian Ventura, Amelia Zafra, Jose M. Luna, Alberto Cano, Juan Luis Olmo
    See Also:
